p: Although the prevalence of adenoviral conjunctivitis was 94.4% in the present study, we cannot consider this figure to represent an epidemic, because sampling in this study was conducted within 1 year, while an epidemic is restricted to a short period. An ideal method to diagnose pathogenic agents of eye infections should be able to diagnose the agents before the patients leave the clinic. 23 Due to the high cost of real-time PCR, it does not seem to be practical in Iran.
